      • build

        public ISWC build(Collection<ICompilerProblem> problems)
        Description copied from interface: ISWCTarget
        Build the target SWC and collect problems. Every time the method is called, a new SWC model is created.
        Specified by:
        build in interface ISWCTarget
        Parameters:
        problems - compilation problems output
        Returns:
        ISWC if build is success

      • addToZipOutputStream

        public boolean addToZipOutputStream(ZipOutputStream output,
                           Collection<ICompilerProblem> problemCollection)
        Description copied from interface: ISWCTarget
        Builds this target and writes the resulting SWC data to the specified ZipOutputStream.
        Specified by:
        addToZipOutputStream in interface ISWCTarget
        Parameters:
        output - ZipOutputStream to which entries are added for the SWC data.
        problemCollection - Collection to which any ICompilerProblems are added.
        Returns:
        true, when the SWC was successfully compiled and written to the specified channel. If false, then problemCollection will have at least one entry explaining why the build failed.

      • computeRootedCompilationUnits

        protected Target.RootedCompilationUnits computeRootedCompilationUnits()
                                                               throws InterruptedException
        Description copied from class: Target
        Computes the set of compilation units that root the dependency walk. The returned set of compilation units and their dependencies will be compiled.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
